alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 4:29PM CDT until September 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Keownville, or near New Albany, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, New Albany, Baldwyn, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Mantachie, Keownville, New Harmony, Blair, Sherman, Blue Springs, Jericho, Branyan, Mooreville, Ellistown, Eggville, Ballardsville, Jug Fork and Baker. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
